Posts.EditableText:
I managed to rebuild a project that was accidently deleted and I finished the main body of the game. I'm currently hoping that some testers can play through the game and note out anything I may have missed.

Disclaimer, this game is published under the Adult category, so you will have to be **+18** to play it. If you don't like vore of any type, this game is not for you also.

The link to it is here if you wish to view through my recreation work:
https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/sshhqqgeleqpivqoltj-qg/behind-the-green-door

I managed to rebuild a project that was accidently deleted and I finished the main body of the game. I'm currently hoping that some testers can play through the game and note out anything I may have missed.

Disclaimer, this game is published under the Adult category, so you will have to be +18 to play it. If you don't like vore of any type, this game is not for you also.
